EmploymentCompensationSummary.name: EmploymentCompensationSummary
EmploymentCompensationSummary.description: Represents information about stakeholder engagement to assess the importance of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues for them.

AverageHourlyWage.description: The average hourly wage of the employees.

Country.description: Specifies the country for which the demographic information is added.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the employee wage summary is generated.

FacilityType.description: Specifies the type of facility that the employees are working in.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MinimumWageEmployeePercent.description: The percentage of employees earning the minimum wage.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Region.description: Specifies the region that the employees belongs to.

S1AdequateWagePercent.description: The percentage of wages that are considered adequate to meet the needs of a worker and their family.

S1AnnlTotRemunHpdIndv.description: The annual total remuneration of the highest paid individual.

S1AvgGrHrlyPayFmlEmp.description: The average gross hourly pay level of female employees.

S1AvgGrHrlyPayMaleEmp.description: The average gross hourly pay level of male employees.

S1MdnAnnlTotRemunEmp.description: The median annual total remuneration for all employees.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as the supplier account.
